Posts.Content: sierrasusieq wrote: HI all. I am asking for my Mother. She has BC mets to the lungs which was diagnosed 3 years ago. After chemo she has been on Arimidex but now her blood counts are going up so the Dr. is going to switch her to Falsodex. Can any of you give me info on what side effects you get from falsodex and if it is working for you in keeping the cancer from spreading?? How long have you been on it?? Thanks , Susan Dx 10/2/2006, IDC, 1cm, Stage IIB, Grade 2, 0/10 nodes, ER+/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
